name: Badger Meter, Inc.
description: Badger Meter, Inc. is a leading global innovator in flow measurement and control technology, serving a wide range of industries including water, oil, and gas. Founded in 1905 and headquartered in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, Badger Meter designs and manufactures flow measurement devices, water quality instruments, and related software solutions that help customers optimize their operations and conserve resources. The company is well-known for its advanced metering technologies and smart water solutions, which enable utilities to improve efficiency, reduce water losses, and enhance customer service. Badger Meter's product offerings include various types of meters, pressure sensors, and data collection systems, all supported by a robust network of partners and a commitment to sustainability. With a strong focus on innovation, the company continuously invests in research and development to deliver cutting-edge solutions that meet the evolving needs of its customers and the environment. Badger Meter aims to lead in the smart water sector, providing reliable data analytics and remote monitoring capabilities that empower utilities to make informed decisions and drive operational excellence.
